title: Client keeps crashing when trying to spectate
body: I'm on Mac OS Yosemite - the game has Sona in it - not sure if this is the same problem that NA had?

replies.body:
OK so now it's actually broken my client. I'm unable to spectate OR play - won't go past the Champion select. 
I did get a bugsplat the first time I tried to spectate the game with Sona in it and now I don't even get the error message - just goes black and I keep having to force quit.
I've repaired the client and it still does it..

Try loading up a custom game, when the screen goes black, hit your "return" (or enter) key and see if the game loads.

Let me know what happens.
Hey there, thanks for that tip. I did read that somewhere else and it's working fine now! :)

Hello leafsie, 

It is actually a [known issue](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#oce) right now that you can't spectate a game with Sona in it. Hopefully there will be a fix soon.
